page.title: 16TIMSBURY FEMALE FASHIONS(4)
page.content: {BELTS. Wide belts are liked by both the children and the teenagers.They are very fashionable at the moment. Medium belts are preferred by adults,and narrow ones are popular with all ages. {COLOURS.} Blue is the colour most worn in this area.Pink,being very fashionable, is a close runner up.Quite popular are the colours red,grey,white and black. Green,yellow and brown are only sometimes worn. People rarely wear lemon,maroon,ginger,turquoise or purple.Nobody in our survey ever wears anything orange. White is a favourite with the young,but not the adults.Green is rather liked by adults,but not by the young. {(Continued) { By Juliette,Rebecca,Gaenor and Naomi.
